td.content: s:a 49 yr old m complains of critical double vision and critical difficulty seeing at night and other medical problems. NKDA. Denies ever using tobacco he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 69 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
